TextView.android:text:
Semester - I

				Foundation Course-Language I 
				Foundation Course-English I 
				Core I-Fundamentals of Digital Computers 
				Core II-PC Software Lab (P) 
				Allied I-Mathematics I 
				Soft Skills - Essentials of Language and Communication - Level I 
				Non-major Elective 

Semester - II 

				Foundation Course-Language II 
				Foundation Course-English II 
				Core III-Prog in C 
				Core IV-Prog in C (P) 
				Allied II-Mathematics II 
				Soft Skills - Essentials of Language and Communication - Level II 
				Non-major Elective
